About
I am a Research Assistant in the Department of Economics at Istanbul Technical University, Turkey.


Research Fields

Applied Microeconomics
Econometrics



Computer Skills

R, Stata, Python, Quarto & R Markdown, \(\LaTeX\), Bash, git, Microsoft Office

title: Understanding Missing Values in Regression
text:
This blog post is about understanding missing value mechanism in a regression setting. After understanding this machanism, I will mention common pitfalls to aviod in data subsetting.

title: Understanding Missing Values in Regression
text:
5.1 Appendix
I can fill this with regular Markdown. This is bold. This is italic.
Also, code chunks work.

library(ggplot2)
mpg |>
  ggplot(aes(hwy, cty)) +
  geom_jitter()

title: Reading Groups
text:
I organize two long-term online reading groups.











Proof-Based Math Readings
Proof-Based Math Readings is a free and independent online reading group where we study mathematics required in economics master’s/PhD programs using an intuitive approach.
This reading group has 27 members for now and accepts new members.
Our syllabuses and application form are available at github.com/zekiakyol/proof-based-math-readings



 Term
 Syllabus
 Book
 Duration




2025 Summer
Measure Theory
Measure, Integration & Real Analysis  - Sheldon Axler (2023)
12 Weeks


2025 Spring
Optimization
A First Course in Optimization Theory  - Rangarajan K. Sundaram (1996)
12 Weeks


2024 Winter
Bayesian  Statistics
Bayesian Econometrics  - Gary Koop (2003)
12 Weeks


2024 Fall
Measure  Theoretic  Probability
A First Look at Rigorous Probability Theory  - Jeffrey S. Rosenthal (2nd Edition, 2006)
12 Weeks


2024 Summer
Large Sample  Theory
Elements of Large-Sample Theory  - E. L. Lehmann (1999)
12 Weeks


2024 Summer
Statistics
Statistical Inference  - George Casella, Roger Berger (2nd Edition, 2024)
12 Weeks


2024 Spring
Linear Algebra
Linear Algebra Done Right  - Sheldon Axler (4th Edition, 2024)
12 Weeks


2023 Winter
Topology
Topology  - James Munkres (2nd Edition, 2014)
12 Weeks


2023 Fall
Matrix Algebra
Matrix Algebra  - Karim M. Abadir, Jan R. Magnus (2005)
12 Weeks


2023 Summer
Real Analysis
Basic Analysis I  - Jiri Lebl (Version 6.0, 2023)
12 Weeks


2023 Summer
Proof Techniques
Book of Proof  - Richard Hammack (3.3 Edition, 2022)
6 Weeks





Machine Learning Readings


 An Introduction to Statistical Learning - Gareth James, Trevor Hastie, Daniela Witten,  Rob Tibshirani, Jonathan Taylor (2nd Edition 2021)
This reading group has 10 members.


(Summer 2023)

title: Photos
text:
The Purest of Doggos

"I'm so happy today!"

"I see those nugs."

"I love you so much!"

"I'm the baby of the house!"

"Are you gunna throw the ball?"

"C'mon friend!"

"A rose for mommy!"

"You gunna finish that?"

"We can't afford a cat!"

"Dis my fren!"
